Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Division/Kostner
ShortDescription: #70 Division buses are temp. rerouted in both directions via Division, Kostner, North Avenue, Cicero and Division due to police activity near Division/Kostner.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Division, Kostner, North Avenue, Cicero, then resume their normal route on Division due to police activity near Division/Kostner.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #111 111th/King Drive Temporary Reroute at 111th/Racine
ShortDescription: 111 111th/King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via 111th, Halsted, 107th, Vincennes, 111th & over regular route, due to street blockage near 111th/Racine.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#111 111th/King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 111th, Halsted, 107th, Vincennes, 111th and over regular route, due to street blockage near 111th/Racine.

Allow extra travel time.
